entry.title: The Geometry of Concepts: Sparse Autoencoder Feature Structure

link.title: The Geometry of Concepts: Sparse Autoencoder Feature Structure

entry.content: We study geometrical structure of Sparse Autoencoder feature vectors at three scales: (a) “atomic” small-scale, (b) “brain” intermediate-scale, and (c) “galaxy” large-scale.

author.name: David Baek, Yuxiao Li, Eric J. Michaud, Joshua Engels, Xiaoqing Sun, Max Tegmark

entry.summary: We study geometrical structure of Sparse Autoencoder feature vectors at three scales: (a) “atomic” small-scale, (b) “brain” intermediate-scale, and (c) “galaxy” large-scale.

entry.title: Generalization from Starvation: Hints of Universality in LLM Knowledge Graph Learning

link.title: Generalization from Starvation: Hints of Universality in LLM Knowledge Graph Learning

entry.content: We study geometrical structure of knowledge representations in Large Language Models (LLMs), and examine hints of representation universality.

author.name: David Baek, Yuxiao Li, Max Tegmark

entry.summary: We study geometrical structure of knowledge representations in Large Language Models (LLMs), and examine hints of representation universality.

entry.title: Filtering Data to Improve NeRF for Driving Scenes

link.title: Filtering Data to Improve NeRF for Driving Scenes

entry.content: We propose a filter-based data-preprocessing strategy for NeRF that enables autonomous driving scene reconstruction with reduced compute time and memory, with the minimal performance loss possible.
entry.summary: We propose a filter-based data-preprocessing strategy for NeRF that enables autonomous driving scene reconstruction with reduced compute time and memory, with the minimal performance loss possible.

entry.title: GenEFT: Understanding Statics and Dynamics of Model Generalization via Effective Theory

link.title: GenEFT: Understanding Statics and Dynamics of Model Generalization via Effective Theory

entry.content: We present GenEFT: an effective theory framework for shedding light on the statics and dynamics of neural network generalization, and illustrate it with graph learning examples.

author.name: David D. Baek, Ziming Liu, Max Tegmark

entry.summary: We present GenEFT: an effective theory framework for shedding light on the statics and dynamics of neural network generalization, and illustrate it with graph learning examples.

entry.title: Design of scalable superconducting quantum circuits using flip-chip assembly

link.title: Design of scalable superconducting quantum circuits using flip-chip assembly

entry.content: We present a method for designing highly scalable superconducting quantum circuits using flip-chip assembly and multi-path coupling strategy.

author.name: Seong Hyeon Park, David Baek, Insung Park, Seungyong Hahn

entry.summary: We present a method for designing highly scalable superconducting quantum circuits using flip-chip assembly and multi-path coupling strategy.

entry.title: Automated System for effectively managing leaves of Korean soldiers

link.title: Automated System for effectively managing leaves of Korean soldiers

entry.content: We built a web application that automatically manages the leaves of Korean soldiers, using Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Passport.js for backend and Vue, Vuetify and Chart.js for the frontend.
entry.summary: We built a web application that automatically manages the leaves of Korean soldiers, using Node.js, Express, MongoDB, Passport.js for backend and Vue, Vuetify and Chart.js for the frontend.

entry.title: Wanderlust: Community for Hikers
entry.content: We built a mobile application which serves as both a guide and a community to hikers all over the world. We used Flutter, Google Maps, and Google Firebase to build our application.

author.name: André Leon Poncelet, David D. Baek, Dimitri Wuest, Emil Johansson, Jonas

entry.summary: We built a mobile application which serves as both a guide and a community to hikers all over the world. We used Flutter, Google Maps, and Google Firebase to build our application.
